summary_text: After returning to his childhood home, a disgraced children's puppeteer is forced to confront his wicked stepfather and the secrets that have tortured his entire life.

name: Close Range
summary_text: A rogue soldier turned outlaw is thrust into a relentless fight with a corrupt sheriff, his obedient deputies, and a dangerous drug cartel in order to protect his sister and her young daughter.

name: A Teacher
summary_text: A high school teacher in Austin, Texas takes sexual advantage over one of her students. Her life begins to unravel as the details of the relationship are exposed.

name: Rapa Nui
summary_text: Love between the representatives of two warring tribes changes the balance of power on the whole remote island.

name: The End of Violence
summary_text: Mike is a successful Hollywood producer of violent movies. Then he himself experiences extreme violence, goes missing, joins some Latino gardeners and reviews his life.

name: Steel Rain
summary_text: A coup in North Korea forces an agent to defect to South with unconscious "Number One". While operatives from North hunt for both of them, the agent has to work with South Koreans to stop the nuclear war.

name: Evidence
summary_text: Ryan makes a documentary on his friend, Brett, and his first time camping, until a mysterious figure in the woods starts hunting them.

name: Decoys
summary_text: Luke and Roger are just another couple of college guys trying to lose their virginity. But when Luke sees something unusual, he begins to suspect that the girls on campus aren't exactly human.

name: Marketa Lazarová
summary_text: A grim portrayal of the shift from Paganism to Christianity in medieval central Europe - as a young virgin promised to God is kidnapped and raped by a marauder who her religious father seeks to kill in return.

name: I Am Jonas
summary_text: Two moments of Jonas's life intertwine, each reflecting the other: in 1995, when he was a secretive teenager, and 18 years later, as an attractive and impulsive thirty-something looking for balance in his life.

name: Il caimano
summary_text: A skewering of Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi.

name: Mr. and Mrs. Iyer
summary_text: During a bus journey, a devout Hindu Brahmin woman protects a Muslim man when communal rioting breaks out.

name: Anjaam Pathiraa
summary_text: The police are on the trail of a serial killer, but with the victims being fellow officers, will they be able to catch the killer and solve the case in time?

name: Town & Country
summary_text: Porter Stoddard is a well-known New York architect who is at a crossroads... a nexus where twists and turns lead to myriad missteps, some with his wife Ellie, others with longtime friends ...                See full summary »

name: The Fits
summary_text: While training at the gym 11-year-old tomboy Toni becomes entranced with a dance troupe. As she struggles to fit in she finds herself caught up in danger as the group begins to suffer from fainting spells and other violent fits.

name: French Twist
summary_text: After learning of her husband's infidelities, a housewife invites an itinerant lesbian to move in with them. None of their lives will ever be the same again.

name: El Sur
summary_text: A woman reflects on her childhood relationship with her father, attempting to understand the depths of his despair and the truth of his myths.

name: Is Anybody There?
summary_text: A lonely boy who lives in his parents' home for the elderly explores his obsession with the afterlife through his friendship with an aging magician.

name: Sweet Sweetback's Baadasssss Song
summary_text: After saving a Black Panther from some racist cops, a black male prostitute goes on the run from "the man" with the help of the ghetto community and some disillusioned Hells Angels.

name: Chithram
summary_text: A woman hires a stranger to pose as her husband because she doesn't want her ailing father to know that her fiance broke their engagement.

name: SPF-18
summary_text: 18-year-old Penny Cooper spent years pining for Johnny Sanders Jr., but when a mysterious musician shows up on the beach, Penny is torn.

name: The Pebble and the Penguin
summary_text: A lovable but introverted penguin named Hubie (Martin Short) plans to present his betrothal pebble to the bird of his dreams.

name: Cop
summary_text: An obsessive, insubordinate homicide cop is convinced a serial killer is loose in the Hollywood area and disobeys orders in order to catch him.

name: Long Day's Journey Into Night
summary_text: At the end of a long and hot summer day, members of one family gather in a large house. Everyone has something painful and offensive to say, and their silence is even worse.

name: Save Yourselves!
summary_text: A young Brooklyn couple heads to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack.

name: In the Name of the King: Two Worlds
summary_text: An ex-Special Forces soldier gets thrown back to medieval times to fulfill an ancient prophecy and ends up finding redemption for his own battlefield experiences.

name: New Rose Hotel
summary_text: Two businessmen are hired to steal secrets from a rival, and decide to use a beautiful call girl to do so.

name: The Shooting
summary_text: A mysterious woman persuades two cowboys to help her in a revenge scheme.

name: King Creole
summary_text: A troubled youth's singing sets New Orleans rockin'. With a sweet girl to love him and nightclubbers cheering, it seems he will shake off his past and head for the top. But will a mobster and his man-trap moll snare him in a life of crime?

name: Cutting Class
summary_text: A murderer is loose in a high school in this 'whodunit' movie.

name: Commando
summary_text: Karan, a disavowed Indian commando, helps protect a woman from a local thug who is hellbent on forcing her to marry him.

name: Just Another Love Story
summary_text: Life in the suburbs as a father of two has worn down Jonas. When a victim of a car crash mistakes him for her boyfriend Sebastian, things take a very dramatic turn as the line between truth and deception is erased.

name: It Runs in the Family
summary_text: This is the story of a dysfunctional New York family, and their attempts to reconcile.

name: Party Girl
summary_text: Party girl Mary gets bailed out of jail by her librarian godmother. She starts working at the library, slowly fills her empty brain.

name: Sugar
summary_text: Dominican baseball star Miguel "Sugar" Santos is recruited to play in the U.S. minor-leagues.

name: Sheeple
summary_text: The story of a gang of drug dealers in the south of Tehran who has sheltered many youngsters and orphans from the streets. Shahin and Shakoor who are brothers are leading the gang but when ...                See full summary »

name: Stratton
summary_text: A British Special Boat Service commando tracks down an international terrorist cell.

name: Fear, Inc.
summary_text: A horror junkie and his friends sign up with a company that brings their customer's greatest fears to life.

name: Diablo
summary_text: A young civil war veteran is forced on a desperate journey to save his kidnapped wife.

name: Playback
summary_text: A teenager investigates the case of a missing local baby, though he discovers a dark secret that has been unleashed in his town, and an evil spirit that will stop at nothing to find its heir.

name: Pokémon: Mewtwo Strikes Back - Evolution
summary_text: After a scientific experiment leads to the creation of a clone of Mewtwo, he sets out to destroy the world. Ash and his friends then decide to thwart Mewtwo's evil plans.

name: Secret Things
summary_text: Two young women find themselves struggling to survive in Paris, street-wise Nathalie, a stripper, and naïve Sandrine, a barmaid. Together, they discover that sex can be used to their ...                See full summary »

name: Autumn Tale
summary_text: A widow's best friend tries to find her a new husband, but the ad posted in the newspaper attracts more than one possibility.

name: Escape to Athena
summary_text: A World War II adventure involving a group of Allied P.O.W.s, Nazis, black market priceless art treasures, Greek resistance, a Greek monastery, and a secret German rocket base.

name: The Grass Is Greener
summary_text: Victor and Hilary have guided tours in their English mansion. A US oil tycoon "bumps" into Hilary during a tour and charms his way into her heart. Meanwhile, Hattie pursues Victor.

name: Spoor
summary_text: Janina Duszejko, an elderly woman, lives alone in the Klodzko Valley where a series of mysterious crimes are committed. Duszejko is convinced that she knows who or what is the murderer, but nobody believes her.

name: The Hebrew Hammer
summary_text: An orthodox Jewish blaxploitation hero saves Hanukkah from the clutches of Santa Claus' evil son.

name: Kingdom of the Spiders
summary_text: In rural Arizona, countless killer tarantulas are migrating through a farm town, killing every living thing in their path. The town's veterinarian will do everything in his power to survive the onslaught.

name: Save the Tiger
summary_text: A disillusioned war veteran has two days to let go of his shaken morals if he wants his small fashion company to survive.

name: Rambling Rose
summary_text: A young woman who exudes sexuality battles temptation.

name: The Mortal Storm
summary_text: The Roth family leads a quiet life in a small village in the German Alps during the early 1930s. When the Nazis come to power, the family is divided and Martin Breitner, a family friend, is caught up in the turmoil.

name: Trance
summary_text: A disheartened motivational speaker gets hired by a corporate to become a preacher until his live stint on television puts him and his service under the scanner.

name: Monamour
summary_text: A neglected housewife has an affair behind her boring husband's back, triggering a passionate transformation. Now, a dash of infidelity awakens his dormant enthusiasm for her; however, is his new-found interest too little, too late?

name: Time Out
summary_text: An unemployed man finds his life sinking more and more into trouble as he hides his situation from his family and friends.

name: What Have You Done to Solange?
summary_text: A teacher who is having an affair with one of his students takes her out on a boat. They see a knife killing on shore. Other gruesome murders start occurring shortly thereafter, and the teacher suspects that he may be the cause of them.

name: Assimilate
summary_text: Three friends making a web series about their town discover that their neighbors are being killed and replaced by creatures who are perfect copies of their victims.

name: Long Weekend
summary_text: When a suburban couple go camping for the weekend at a remote beach, they discover that nature isn't in an accommodating mood.

name: Le Magnifique
summary_text: Francois Merlin is an espionnage-book writer. He likes to mix every-day character he can met in his book. In his book, he is Bob Saint Clar, his neighbour Christine appears as Tatiana and ...                See full summary »

name: Cheaper by the Dozen
summary_text: "Cheaper By the Dozen", based on the real-life story of the Gilbreth family, follows them from Providence, Rhode Island to Montclair, New Jersey, and details the amusing anecdotes found in ...                See full summary »

name: Sushi Girl
summary_text: Upon his release from prison, Fish is brought to an abandoned restaurant by his old associate, Duke, to celebrate his newfound freedom. However, there's unfinished business that Duke is determined to solve.

name: Doogal
summary_text: A talking dog and his friends fight to stop an evil wizard.

name: The Blue Gardenia
summary_text: A telephone operator ends up drunk and at the mercy of a cad in his apartment. The next morning she wakes up with a hangover and the terrible fear she may be a murderess.

name: Tamam miyiz?
summary_text: The key to the puzzle of forlorn sculpture Tammuz's life and reality of his dreams lies within Ihsan who is a young boy with tetra-amelia syndrome.

name: Truth or Consequences, N.M.
summary_text: A group of crooks, an ex con, his friend and a gun crazy gangster plan a drug heist, but not everything goes as planned.

name: Maquia: When the Promised Flower Blooms
summary_text: Escaping war, a young girl finds a lone surviving infant and decides to raise him as her son.

name: Griff the Invisible
summary_text: Griff, office worker by day, superhero by night, has his world turned upside down when he meets Melody, a beautiful young scientist who shares his passion for the impossible.

name: F*&% the Prom
summary_text: On the first day of high school, two friends split before reconnecting three years later to sabotage prom.

name: CQ
summary_text: A young filmmaker in 1960s Paris juggles directing a cheesy sci-fi debacle, directing his own personal art film, coping with his crumbling relationship with his girlfriend, and a new-found infatuation with the sci-fi film's starlet.

name: Peeples
summary_text: Sparks fly when Wade Walker crashes the Peeples annual reunion in the Hamptons to ask for their precious daughter Grace's hand in marriage.

name: Steel Dawn
summary_text: In a post-apocalyptic world, a warrior wandering through the desert comes upon a group of settlers who are being menaced by a murderous gang that is after the water they control.

name: Guilty of Romance
summary_text: A grisly murder occurs in Maruyama-cho, Shibuya, Tokyo - a love hotel district - a woman was found dead in a derelict apartment. Kazuko (Miki Mizuno) is a police officer called to ...                See full summary »

name: Valami Amerika
summary_text: Tamás is a young, Budapest-based director of video clips and commercials who dreams of directing his first feature film with the title 'The Guilty City'. He has already written the script ...                See full summary »

name: Racing Hearts
summary_text: A New York businessman must choose between the deal of his career and the love of his life.

name: The Fencer
summary_text: Fleeing from the Russian secret police, a young Estonian fencer is forced to return to his homeland, where he becomes a physical education teacher at a local school. The past however catches up and puts him in front of a difficult choice.

name: Maine Pyaar Kyun Kiya
summary_text: Samir is in love with Sonia but has unfortunately lied to her that he was already married.When she wants to meet her wife,Samir approaches his dutiful nurse Naina to play 'wife'a drama that turns out into a comedy of errors.

name: Godforsaken
summary_text: Two small-town Dutch boys have such a close socially unnatural friendship that they care nothing for human or divine rules and lose all grip on reality, sliding into violent crime.
